# Set-Up

```{r}
#| message: false

library(extraDistr)
library(tidyverse)
library(data.table)

source('../functions.R', encoding = 'UTF-8')
source('../functions_vec.R', encoding = 'UTF-8')
```

# Restrictions

-   Confidence Level: 80% - 99%

-   M: 1 - 50

-   m: 1 - M

-   x: 1 - 50

Note: consider max N impact of computation time

Need to make sure it's big enough to capture the observed x's interval -\> add condition where if an interval isn't produced, increase max_N?

# CMC

```{r}
Sys.time()
cmc_ci_N_unkown_vec(M = 10, m = 5, conf_level = 0.99, max_N = 300)
Sys.time()
```

# CG

```{r}
Sys.time()
minimal_cardinality_ci_N_unkown_vec(M = M, m = m, conf_level = conf_level, max_N = max_N, procedure = "CG")
Sys.time()
```

# Blaker

```{r}
Sys.time()
blaker_ci_N_unkown_vec(M = M, m = m, conf_level = conf_level, max_N = max_N)
Sys.time()
```
